room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: The Zodiac room was everything. Staff was very nice and very clear about rules. Extremely fun, the setup of the room really puts you in the atmosphere of the story behind it.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Oh I have been looking forward to this room for awhile! I volunteered to be the first victim in, and was rewarded by being handcuffed down. Be warned there's a lot of blood and it has a definite creep factor. These puzzles were not as challenging mentally, but because of the handcuffs and clear physical limitations, proved to be pretty difficult to finally escape.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: I did the Zodiac room with my girlfriends and had so much fun! I would definitely recommenced it if you like horror and scary and interactive! I was thoroughly impressed by this room and the puzzles involved! Also our game master Danny was so funny and sweet and cute! I cannot wait to come back and do their other rooms!
